ygData.subject: RE: Paw Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: It is very hard to explain, but I will attempt to.  1st warning - you must either be able to gate or have a 2nd person with you, or you will be locked in the
ygData.messageBody:
It is very hard to explain, but I will attempt to. 1st warning - you must
either be able to gate or have a 2nd person with you, or you will be locked
in the cell. Enter Paw and cross the first bridge. The hall heads left
there and there are 3 doors at the end. The left door leads to a overpass
over the area you came through, the right door leads deeper into the
dungeon. The middle door leads to the jail cells.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
Solusek Ro

> From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
>
> As of when? I did it just the other day on test and it still worked.
>
> And isn't anyone going to answer my question about where the Paladin
> is in Paw??! :)
